data_table.description: This sample attributes table includes body site where sample was collected, analyte type, tumor status, histological type, sequencing center, funding source, TOPMed phase, project, and study name.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: SEQUENCING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted sequencing

variable.name: Study_Name
variable.description: TOPMed-assigned short study name (1:1 with TOPMed phs number)
